statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_records;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_health_records ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, height, weight FROM patient_health_records WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, allergies, medications FROM patient_health_records WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL AND medications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patient_health_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_health_records WHERE blood_type = 'A+' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_records WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, allergies, medications FROM patient_health_records WHERE medications LIKE '%Aspirin%' OR medications LIKE '%Ibuprofen%';
SELECT patient_id, medical_conditions, lab_results FROM patient_health_records WHERE lab_results ->> 'sugar_level' > '150' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE hospital_admissions > 0;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value, result_units FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE surgery != 0;

SELECT patients.first_name, medical_history.diagnosis, lab_results.test_name, lab_results.result_value, lab_results.result_units FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN lab_results ON patients.patient_id = lab_results.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Influenza';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT patient_id, note_text FROM patient_notes ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_value >= 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_notes ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY gender ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM doctors;
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT history_details, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, result, test_date FROM lab_results WHERE patient_id = 2;
